ComicInfo.Summary: Rock This Town: Bedrock starts fighting Dragon, causing a lot of destruction to the city. When asked why he attacked Dragon, Bedrock says he did it because he wanted to see if Dragon was tough enough to join Youngblood. Meanwhile, Frank Darling is blackmailed into working for The Overlord and Skullface.
